product_name: Harmony Valley Camp Cuisine Vegetarian Sausage Mix
long_description: An ideal way to start your morning, the savory Harmony Valley Camp Cuisine Vegetarian Sausage Mix is seasoned with hints of spice and sage to mimic the flavors of a traditional breakfast sausage.
short_description: An ideal way to start your morning, the savory Harmony Valley Camp Cuisine Vegetarian Sausage Mix is seasoned with hints of spice and sage to mimic the flavors of a traditional breakfast sausage.
